contents: Article 12-2 (Senior Non-executive Director) ① There shall be one senior non-executive director on the Board of Directors, who shall be elected from among the non-executive directors. ② The senior non-executive director shall hold a non-executive director's meeting to review the agenda of the Board of Directors in advance and discuss matters related to the operation of the institution. may convene and preside over the meeting., ③ The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall provide support for matters necessary for the senior non-executive director to perform his or her duties., [This Article Newly Inserted on July 11, 2019]
